downloadTitle: MVP Session 4: Align and Distribute Shapes in Visio 2010 (working file)
downloadDescription: Practice applying automatic alignment and spacing to improve initial process depictions in Microsoft Visio 2010 with this diagram, part of the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions (http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions), Video 4.
detailsSection: Practice applying automatic alignment and spacing to improve initial process depictions in Visio 2010 with this diagram, created as a companion to the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions (http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions), Video 4. MVP Sessions Video 4 covers shape spacing and alignment options to improve the look of your diagrams. Use this working file to follow along with the video and practice applying different automatic shape alignment and spacing options, as well as keyboard shortcuts to help you quickly create exactly the diagrams you want. You can use these skills and shortcuts when working with any drawing in Visio 2010.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the working file to your computer and then open it with Visio 2010.
